attributes.action: Allow Tul Bahadar Pun residential access to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Pun was awarded the VC after he carried out a single-handed attack on a machine gun post while serving as a Rifleman with the 3rd Battalion, 6th Gurkha Rifles, in Burma. He served the United Kingdom and offered his life to defend it surely the Prime Minister must act and support this brave mans request to residential access to the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
